Class GwtClientCall

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.client.engine.adapter.Call
      org.restlet.client.engine.adapter.ClientCall

public class GwtClientCall
extends ClientCall

HTTP client connector call based on GWT's HTTP module.

Author:
Jerome Louvel
